✨  Claude-Powered Improvements
🟢  Active Voice - page_3_line_1
Original:
change is caused by climate?
Improved:
Does climate drive this
change?
Explanation: Converted from passive to active voice by
restructuring as a direct question with "climate" as the active
subject performing the action of driving change. This creates
more engaging, conversational language while maintaining
the technical inquiry.
Confidence: High
✅  Approve

• Tropical species
demonstrateExplanation: The original text appears incomplete, but I
converted the fragment from a passive construction ("are") to
an active verb ("demonstrate") that positions tropical species
as the active subject performing an action. This creates more
direct, engaging language while maintaining the technical
context.
Confidence: Medium (Due To The Incomplete Nature Of The
Original Text, But The Directional Change From Passive To
Active Voice Is Clearly Beneficial)
✅  Approve
 ✏  Edit
 ❌  Reject

improvement. Replace neutral descriptors with confident,
benefit-focused language:

Use: "This solution accelerates data processing and delivers
faster insights"
